author: johnydony
content:
Hello Guys. 
Can I ask how can I join the apprenticeship program?

author: pipermerriam
content: Program isn't open to new applicants at this time.  Keep an eye on the ethereum blog (blog.ethereum.org) sometime closer to the summer.  If we run another cohort, it will be announced there.
